Name: StoryBookAreaText
Notes: An area that will display a specific text message when entered in special "picture book" stages.

Obj_arg0.Name: Message ID
Obj_arg0.Description: The ID of the message to be displayed. Default is -1.

SW_APPEAR.Description: Appears when this switch is activated.

SW_AWAKE.Description: Enables rendering and resumes updates when this switch is active.

Message.Description: Displayed when the player is inside this area. The label has the format StoryBook%03d where %03d is Obj_arg0's value. Needs to be specified in the zone's text file.
